definitions: the process of claiming something back or of reasserting a right

examples.text: the reclamation of our shared history
these memories are a conscious act of reclamation
I understand her work as a reclamation of a lost Italian cultural legacy

shortDefinitions: process of reclaiming or being reclaimed

definitions: the cultivation of waste land or land formerly under water

examples.text: the aggressive reclamation of woodlands for agricultural production

shortDefinitions: cultivation of waste land or land formerly under water
